scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Betrayal of Christ, with Jesus at the center being kissed by Judas. Jesus, wearing a red robe, is surrounded by a group of figures. Judas, in a yellow and green robe, is shown kissing Jesus, while another figure, possibly a disciple, is being struck down by a club, lying on the ground. To the right, soldiers in armor, one with a golden breastplate, are apprehending Jesus. In the background, a cityscape with towers and buildings is visible under a cloudy sky. A lantern is held by one of the figures, illuminating the scene.
